## Real Test Vectors {#real-vectors}

### OPAQUE-3DH Real Test Vector 1

#### Configuration

~~~
OPRF: 0001
Hash: SHA512
MHF: Identity
KDF: HKDF-SHA512
MAC: HMAC-SHA512
EnvelopeMode: 01
Group: ristretto255
Context: 4f50415155452d504f43
Nh: 64
Npk: 32
Nsk: 32
Nm: 64
Nx: 64
Nok: 32
~~~

### OPAQUE-3DH Real Test Vector 2

#### Configuration

~~~
OPRF: 0001

MHF: Identity
KDF: HKDF-SHA512

EnvelopeMode: 01
Group: ristretto255
Context: 4f50415155452d504f43
Nh: 64
Npk: 32
Nsk: 32
Nm: 64
Nx: 64
Nok: 32
~~~

### OPAQUE-3DH Real Test Vector 3

#### Configuration

~~~
OPRF: 0003
Hash: SHA256
MHF: Identity
KDF: HKDF-SHA256
MAC: HMAC-SHA256
EnvelopeMode: 01
Group: P256_XMD:SHA-256_SSWU_RO_
Context: 4f50415155452d504f43
Nh: 32
Npk: 33
Nsk: 32
Nm: 32
Nx: 32
Nok: 32
~~~

### OPAQUE-3DH Real Test Vector 4

#### Configuration

~~~
OPRF: 0003
Hash: SHA256
MHF: Identity
KDF: HKDF-SHA256
MAC: HMAC-SHA256
EnvelopeMode: 01
Group: P256_XMD:SHA-256_SSWU_RO_
Context: 4f50415155452d504f43
Nh: 32
Npk: 33
Nsk: 32
Nm: 32
Nx: 32
Nok: 32
~~~
